TopicTitle: Plz put an Ship design Categorie in SpacePort Plz !

Articles.Content:
Bored to see the SpacePort Spammed by creepy ships designs ?

Bored to scroll down 4 pages of the same dammit ship design ?

Ask Kerbal Dev to put an new categorie for Ship designing in the Spaceport for who care about Ships Designs.
Don't we already have a Crafts tab? Went for a quick look through it and some of the submissions were dupli- or triplicated, though. That could probably be cleaned up a bit.

Moved to the Spaceport forum.

I believe there is already a Crafts category.

It's just that many craft files are submitted with a whole lot of tags checked other than "craft".

I think Spaceport needs some way to remove tag-spam submissions. Running a query that removes all tags except "craft" from submission that have the "craft" tag might go a long way toward making Spaceport more useful.
